name: Legacy Call to the Honor of the Battlefield: The Phantom Putin
name_original: Legacy Call to the Honor of the Battlefield: The Phantom Putin
description:
Use WSAD to move around, and R to reload. 

Mouse is used to aim and shoot. 
Made by 4 college students for a class.

This game is now back in development, by me. If I gain traction, I will contact the other developers and make this game Great Again.
